Name: LINQ to Active Directory Refresh Release 1.0.1
Description:
! Refresh Release 1.0.1

Includes bug fixes and support for:

* byte[]- and *GUID-valued directory attributes*.
* *Bug fix* for non-constant EndsWith, BeginsWith and Contains clauses.
* Introduction of *DirectoryContext* with support for nested contexts and direct update support.
* *Extension methods* for DirectorySearcher and DirectoryEntry classes to create queryable objects on the fly.
* Support for *DirectorySearcher* in data source and context constructors enabling more flexibility for search options.
* *Updated samples* to use the new available features.

Name: LINQ to Active Directory RTW
Description: Gold release of the LINQ to Active Directory sample.
